ygData.subject: Re: Bard Superstitions?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hahaha I love this. Again, as my Ranger (with 800 hps) I once told my group to jump off the roof if they get in trouble, but I told them to expect to lose
ygData.messageBody:
>Do you know about the emergency exit from the hand room? Out
>the door to the roof, then jump down to the main path leading
>to the zone. Your safefall should prevent you from taking any
>damage from the jump.

Hahaha I love this.

Again, as my Ranger (with 800 hps) I once told my group to jump off the roof
if they get in trouble, but I told them to expect to lose a half bubble of
life (so jump before that). So the battle goes badly, and I start screaming
JUMP! JUMP! and our wizard with two bubbles of health jumps off and dies! :P
Of course, 115 damage is about two bubbles for him. :P

Forgive me, I'm blonde.

Brin & Daleia
